headline: Will Oracle's (ORCL) Rural Healthcare Push Reveal a New Edge in AI-Powered Solutions?
summary: In recent weeks, Marshall Browning Hospital announced it will transition from its legacy electronic health record system to Oracle Health CommunityWorks solutions and adopt Oracle Health Clinical AI Agent, aiming to streamline workflows, reduce administrative burdens, and elevate patient care in its rural setting. This move underscores Oracle's expanding footprint in rural healthcare IT and highlights its focus on using AI-powered tools to address efficiency and connectivity challenges in...
